news.title: UK now best placed country on trade, says Reeves
news.summary: The chancellor tells the BBC the latest trade agreements with the EU, US and India will boost economic growth.

news.title: Chris Mason: EU deal a reminder of an uneasy relationship
news.summary: Our political editor reflects on the UK's deal with the EU to smoothen frictions in trade.

news.title: Family criticises law change on paedophiles' parental rights
news.summary: Those convicted of child sexual offences may not be banned from contact with their own offspring.

news.title: UK, France and Canada threaten action against Israel over Gaza
news.summary: The three nations "strongly oppose" Benjamin Netanyahu's expansion of military operations, a statement from their leaders said.

news.title: British man breaks record for fastest run across Australia
news.summary: William Goodge ran from Perth to Sydney in 35 days, running the equivalent of 2.5 marathons each day.

news.title: Sesame Street heads to Netflix after Trump pulled funding
news.summary: The platform will offer a new season and 90 hours of previous episodes to its 300 million subscribers.

news.title: The Papers: 'UK condemns Israel' and 'Brexit reset'
news.summary: Reaction to the UK's new trade deal with the EU dominated the front pages of Tuesday's papers.

news.title: Tesla battery maker sees shares jump on Hong Kong debut
news.summary: China's CATL makes more than a third of electric vehicle batteries sold worldwide and also supplies VW and Toyota.

news.title: The Â£100m final Man Utd cannot afford to lose?
news.summary: Manchester United play "the most financially important match in the club's history" against Tottenham on Wednesday - BBC sports editor Dan Roan explains why it is one they cannot afford to lose.

news.title: Postecoglou's second-season success - what and how has he won?
news.summary: "I always win things in my second year," said Ange Postecoglou, who hopes to guide Tottenham to glory in the Europa League final.
